name: Project Euclid
description:
What is Project Euclid?

Project Euclid is a game that based on non-euclid world paradox. Simply it's a puzzle story game which is made in 48 hours for Mağara Jam IEF.  You have to find a way to break that paradox for freedom. 

Team

Muratcan İnaltekin -> Coder

Ahmet Eren Oğuz -> 3D & Texture Artist,

Ömer Salih Sarı -> Game & 2D Designer

How To Play

It's simply a walkin simulator with a little puzzle on it. You have to find have to keep your items in your inventory for breaking the paradox or not breaking?
